abilities.name: Overzealous
abilities.effect: If your opponent has any Pokémon-ex in play, each of Machamp's attacks do 30 more damage to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Brick Smash
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cross Chop
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 damage plus 30 more damage.
